Class MATSTask

java.lang.Object
  mats_model.MATSComponent
      mats_model.MATSTask

public class MATSTask
extends MATSComponent

Author:
boconno3, elee, rparames, asaini Defines the task objects which describe a certain job for the owner and do not contain any tasks or subprojects within

Method Detail

changeOwner

public boolean changeOwner(MATSUser newOwner,
                           MATSUser whoAmI)
Parameters:
newOwner - - instance of the owner that the task should record as the new owner
whoAmI - - instance of the user trying to make the chance
Returns:
If the owner of the task was changed successfully then return true, otherwise false The creator or the current owner can change the owner of this task, otherwise no change is made and the method returns false.

setDescription

public boolean setDescription(MATSUser user,
                              java.lang.String descrip)
Overrides:
setDescription in class MATSComponent
Parameters:
user - - instance of the user trying to make the change
descrip - - the new description to change to this task
Returns:
If the description was changed successfully then return true, otherwise false The creator of this task is the only one that can change the description of this task. The method returns false if the user trying to make the change is not the creator.

changeDeadline

public boolean changeDeadline(MATSUser user,
                              java.util.Date newDate)
Parameters:
user - - instance of the user trying to make the change
newDate - - the new deadline date to change to this task
Returns:
If the deadline was changed successfully then return true, otherwise false The creator of this task in the only one that can change the deadline due date for this task. The method returns false if the user trying to make the change is not the creator

changeState

public boolean changeState(int destination,
                           MATSUser user)
Parameters:
user - - instance of the user trying to make the change
destination - - the new state of task to change to this task
Returns:
If the task state was changed successfully then return true, otherwise false The creator of this task in the only one that can change the state of the task. The method returns false if the user trying to make the change is not the creator.
